attributes.action: Prioritise front line police officers and police staff for covid 19 vaccination
attributes.additional_details: Keep police officers and staff safe in the course of their duties to protect the public.
attributes.background: Police officers and staff have daily contact with the public, enter homes and give life saving first aid. They are at high risk for catching and spreading covid 19. Please give consideration for this group to be a priority in the covid 19 vaccination programme.
